Title: Blog Platform
Description: A simple platform for writing, editing, and publishing blog posts.

Title: Weather App
Description: Displays real-time weather data for any location using a weather API.

Title: Chat Application
Description: A real-time chat app with user authentication and private rooms.

Title: Job Board
Description: A platform where employers can post jobs and applicants can apply.

Title: To-Do List
Description: A clean and interactive app to keep track of tasks and mark them as complete.

Title: URL Shortener
Description: Generates short URLs that redirect to original long URLs.

Title: Online Polling System
Description: Users can create and vote in polls, with results shown in real-time.

Title: Inventory Management System
Description: Tool to track product stock, orders, and suppliers for small businesses.

Title: Online Learning Platform
Description: A course management system with videos, quizzes, and progress tracking.

Title: Social Media Dashboard
Description: An interface to manage and schedule posts across social media accounts.

Title: Customer Support Ticketing System
Description: System to manage customer queries, assign support agents, and track resolution.

Title: Habit Tracker
Description: App to help users build and maintain daily habits and routines.

Title: Crypto Price Tracker
Description: Shows live cryptocurrency prices and historical charts.

Title: Language Learning App
Description: Interactive platform to learn languages through vocabulary, quizzes, and challenges.

Title: Expense Splitter
Description: Tool to divide bills among a group of people with a running balance log.
